oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wreath product action on generalized Boolean algebras
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MISHRA, A
SRINIVASAN, MK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: TERWILLIGER ALGEBRA
UPPER-BOUNDS
CODES
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Let G be a finite group acting on the finite set X such that the corresponding (complex) permutation representation is multiplicity free. There is a natural rank and order preserving action of the wreath product G similar to S-n on the generalized Boolean algebra B-X (n). We explicitly block diagonalize the commutant of this action.
